meanings.definition: To spell out or name the letters of a word in order
meanings.sent1: She speeled her name for the teacher during the spelling bee.
meanings.sent2: He always speeled out difficult words to make sure he got them right.
meanings.sent3: The robot speeled out the secret code to unlock the door.
meanings.sent4: The magician speeled the magic word, making the rabbit disappear.
meanings.sent5: The detective speeled the mysterious message, revealing the hidden clue.

meanings.definition: To talk or communicate in a particular way
meanings.sent1: He speeled his thoughts clearly during the presentation.
meanings.sent2: She always speels in a friendly and welcoming manner.
meanings.sent3: The parrot speeled in different languages to impress the visitors.
meanings.sent4: His words speeled like music to her ears, soothing and comforting.
meanings.sent5: The radio host speeled enthusiastically, engaging the listeners with his stories.

meanings.sent1: The skater speeled across the ice with grace and skill.
meanings.sent2: The car speeled down the highway, passing other vehicles effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel speeled up the tree trunk in search of nuts.
meanings.sent4: The river speeled through the valley, reflecting the sunlight beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The athlete speeled through the obstacle course, completing it in record time.
